epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure enterprise authentication with role-based access and tenant isolation.
epics.description: Develop a centralized authentication system integrated with enterprise identity providers using standards like SAML, OAuth 2.0, and OpenID Connect for single sign-on (SSO). Introduce role-based access control (RBAC) and tenant isolation to ensure users only access data relevant to their organization and role. Enable multifactor authentication (MFA), enforce password policies, and maintain full session auditing to meet enterprise security requirements.

epics.title: Multi-Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
epics.summary: Enable secure onboarding and integration with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud APIs.
epics.description: Design and implement workflows that allow users to securely onboard enterprise cloud accounts across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Integrate natively with each providerâ€™s authentication system using secure API keys, tokens, or service principles while ensuring encrypted secret storage. Validate connectivity and permissions, and set up recurring authentication checks to maintain long-term integration reliability.

epics.title: Automated Resource Discovery and Normalization Framework
epics.summary: Automatically discover resources across onboarded clouds and normalize data for unified visibility.
epics.description: Create a discovery framework that scans onboarded accounts periodically to identify and classify infrastructure, storage, network, and security resources. Implement normalization logic to map provider-specific resource formats to a universal schema, enabling consistent reporting and analytics. Optimize performance with incremental discovery, error retries, and API throttling to ensure efficiency and accuracy at scale.

epics.title: Unified Multi-Cloud Dashboard
epics.summary: Build a customizable single-pane-of-glass dashboard for personalized, role-aware insights.
epics.description: Develop an interactive and customizable dashboard that presents cloud inventory, cost analytics, security posture, and compliance status based on user roles and permissions. Incorporate dynamic filtering, drill-down views, and data segmentation by provider, region, or project. Enable real-time data synchronization with intuitive visual widgets and KPIs to simplify complex multi-cloud information into actionable insights.

epics.title: Cost Management and Optimization Insights
epics.summary: Enable unified cost visibility and provide actionable recommendations for cost optimization.
epics.description: Aggregate cost and usage data from all connected cloud providers to deliver consolidated financial insights. Identify cost-saving opportunities using automated analysis such as idle resource detection, rightsizing, and commitment recommendations. Implement forecasting capabilities, trend visualization, and anomaly detection to empower users to make data-driven optimization decisions that reduce operational overhead.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Assessment Engine
epics.summary: Implement continuous scanning and evaluation for security and compliance posture.
epics.description: Build a rule-based evaluation system that continuously assesses cloud configurations against established frameworks such as CIS Benchmarks, NIST, and ISO 27001. Provide detailed findings with remediation guidance and maintain historical records for compliance tracking. Integrate with external vulnerability and policy databases, allowing dynamic updates to compliance rules as new standards evolve.

epics.title: Governance Automation and CI/CD Integration
epics.summary: Enable automated governance actions integrated into existing CI/CD and IaC processes.
epics.description: Develop a governance automation module that enforces policies and executes automated workflows like environment provisioning, policy enforcement, or configuration drift correction. Integrate with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, and Azure DevOps, and with IaC technologies like Terraform, Ansible, and CloudFormation. Include approval chains, version-controlled policies, and auditable workflow histories to ensure consistent governance.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notification Framework
epics.summary: Implement real-time alerts for cost anomalies, compliance violations, and security risks.
epics.description: Design a configurable alerting engine that monitors cost spikes, compliance drift, and security vulnerability findings in real time. Support notification delivery through email, chat integrations (Teams, Slack), and webhooks. Include event correlation, escalation chains, and suppression logic to reduce alert noise while maintaining high visibility for critical events. Provide alert dashboards for review and acknowledgment tracking.

epics.title: Audit Trail and Change History Management
epics.summary: Implement immutable, searchable audit logging for user and system activities.
epics.description: Develop a detailed activity logging system to capture all user actions, system events, and automation workflows. Store logs securely in tamper-proof storage, enriched with metadata such as user identifiers, action type, timestamps, and resource references. Enable advanced search, filtering, and export options along with long-term retention policies for compliance with industry audit requirements.

epics.title: Platform Scalability, Reliability, and Performance Engineering
epics.summary: Ensure the platform is resilient, scalable, and optimized for enterprise workloads.
epics.description: Architect the system for high performance and scalability across multiple tenants and large workloads. Implement auto-scaling, load balancing, and data sharding mechanisms to ensure consistent performance under load. Introduce continuous monitoring for system health, latency, and throughput. Design fault-tolerant modules, enable redundancy and implement disaster recovery capabilities to maintain enterprise-grade reliability.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture integrates various Azure services such as Azure AD for identity management, Azure Arc and Azure Lighthouse for multi-cloud management, and Azure Cost Management for financial tracking. Security is handled by Azure Security Center and Defender for Cloud while Azure Automation and Logic Apps enable automation workflows. Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions manage CI/CD pipelines. Real-time monitoring and alerts are provided by Azure Monitor, and logging is centralized by Azure Log Analytics with Azure Sentinel providing SIEM capabilities.
